markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deteriorating Dust](/Equipment.aspx?ID=565)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

**Access** follower of  Rovagug 

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Contained in a specially enchanted small leather or hide sack, _deteriorating dust_ is a potent caustic agent and a prized item among Rovagug’s more discreet followers.

<document level="2" id="action-352" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Deteriorating Dust
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The affected object takes 1 damage per 3 hours (8 damage per day) and its Hardness is reduced by 1 per hour. The effect lasts for 3 days.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Extended Deteriorating Dust
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 45 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The affected object takes 1 damage per 3 hours (8 damage per day) and its Hardness is reduced by 1 per hour. The effect lasts for 1 week.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Caustic Deteriorating Dust
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 105 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The affected object takes 1 damage per hour (24 damage per day) and its Hardness is reduced by 1 per hour. The effect lasts for 3 days.
name: Caustic Deteriorating Dust
